meanings.sent5: The sapremic odor coming from the old fridge was unbearable.

meanings.definition: Containing or produced by decaying organic matter.
meanings.sent1: The sapremic soil was rich in nutrients for the plants.
meanings.sent2: The pond water turned a murky brown color due to the sapremic leaves.
